meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by rotation.
meanings.sent1: The rotative motion of the windmill blades generates electricity.
meanings.sent2: The rotative movement of the Earth around the sun creates seasons.
meanings.sent3: The rotative dance performance mesmerized the audience with its graceful spins.
meanings.sent4: Her rotative schedule kept her constantly on the move like a spinning top.
meanings.sent5: The rotative sprinkler evenly waters the entire garden with its rotating mechanism.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that rotates or causes rotation.
meanings.sent1: The factory installed a new rotative to increase production efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The rotative at the playground spins children around for fun.
meanings.sent3: The chef used a rotative to mix the ingredients for the cake batter.
meanings.sent4: The rotative on the carnival ride made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The rotative in the clock keeps the hands moving smoothly to show the time.
